item.title: WoDu Remix Character Sheet
item.description: flare gradient version Black & White - PDF Low Ink, Single Contrast - PDF flare, color - PDF Source Code (Typst) Branching off from FIST, I found the neat PbtA + OSR collection on Itch that contains a bunch of games inspired by World of Dungeons (WoDu1), the Dungeon World pre-order bonus that’s basically B/X D&D but you do the 2d6 thing from Apocalypse World instead of a d20. Among the collection is Remix (WoDu Remix) which neatly splits the difference between the OSR, storygames, and 5e, and gets me excited about it every time I crack it open.
